Package bacnet.sequenceTools

Class GeneViewHomologTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • bacnet.sequenceTools.GeneViewHomologTools
  • public class GeneViewHomologTools
extends java.lang.Object
    All the tools to display homologs in the Gene Panel view: - It creates the homolog table - Create the homolog figure - Display both of them
    Author:
    UIBC
